display_name: Short Form (36) Health Survey (SF-36): Vitality subscale score (standardized)
description:
The subscale score is based on 4 items from the Medical Outcomes Study Short Form 36 (SF-36). A high score suggests the participant "feels full of pep and energy all of the time in the past 4 week ". [Ware JE and Sherbourne CD, 1992 (PubMed ID: 1593914)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1593914/)

[Search for all SF-36 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/homepap/variables?search=mossf36)
